Body: WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | REDDIT | LINKEDIN | BLOG | WHITEPAPER  https://s8.postimg.cc/vaz423h85/Logo_Vertical_2.png   What is Lexzoom? LEXZOOM is a valuable and secured digitized Real Estate Investment token that transacts on ERC 20, this asset facilitates investment in emerging real estate markets around the world.   What is Lexzoom Token? Lexzoom Token is the value of asset investment in the Lexzoom Smart contract.   WHAT CAN LEXZOOM TOKEN BE USED FOR? https://www.lexzoom.tech/assets//img/about_description.png LXM token is meant to be invested in available real estate investment on the Lexzoom platform. LXM is a globally adopted REIT, holders can trade with it within the LXM eco-system to transact with brokers and renters. LXM can be held and transferred on appreciation or at will in relation to similar ETH Tokens or cryptocurrencies. Alternatively, if LXM token holders want to sell their assets, they can sell the LXM tokens on our upcoming Lexzoom Exchange (LMXex) or public exchanges like Ether delta.    WHERE DOES THE VALUE COME FROM? The value derivative of the Lexzoom token is in the Lexzoom real estate asset management, the volume of token traded and its adoption in the real estate investment market. This will ensure a cushioning effect of its volatility in relation to other traded token in the crypto market, making the token more resilience to negative real estate and crytocurrency industry fundamentals.   THE TECHNOLOGY https://www.lexzoom.tech/assets/img/technology.svg Here at Lexzoom, we’re convinced that blockchain technology with smart contracts is the core engine for the long-term real estate investment industry. Smart contracts will be written in Ethereum Solidity to drive accounting / ERC-20 token movement.   HOW DOES ICO WORK? ICO (Intial Coin Offering) is a crowdfunding process where tokens-LEXZOOM tokens are purchased using cryptocurrencies. You can find more details in our Whitepaper.   WHAT WILL THE MONEY RAISEDIN THE ICO BE USED FOR? Download the whitepaper for details  [https://youtu.be/MPbZQubSiNM]https://www.lexzoom.tech/assets/img/video.jpg[/url]  IS THERE AN GEOGRAPHICAL RESTRICTIONS? LXM token investment opportunities can be accessed across the globe and has no restrictions and government regulation barriers, holders of the asset will be investing into viable real estate asset in emerging property markets.   HOWCAN I INVEST IN THE LEXZOOM INVESTMENT TRUST WITH MY TOKEN? The investors token are available on the Lexzoom Trust Fund, then the investor can receive updates of real estate investment opportunities on the Lexzoom Investment Trust and make investment in an asset of choice.   WHAT PROBLEMS DO LEXZOOM SOLVE? Government policies & regulations Geographical restrictions Client data insecurity Complex transaction processes Crypto market volatility Complex documentation and proof of ownership/asset Inadequate real estate Investment fund Crypto-token unrealizable proof of stake https://www.lexzoom.tech/assets/lexzoom-whitepaper.pdfhttps://www.lexzoom.tech/assets/img/whitepaper.svg[/url]  WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | REDDIT | LINKEDIN | BLOG | WHITEPAPER
